original_solution_mapping.L1: In six years, Jane will be 28+6 = <<28+6=34>>34 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Dara will be half the age of Jane in six years, meaning she will be 34/2 = <<34/2=17>>17 years old in six years.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Dara has to wait for 25-11 = <<25-11=14>>14 more years to reach the company's minimum age of employment.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3277.
    Returns: the number of years Dara needs to wait to reach the minimum employment age.
    """
    # L1
    jane_current_age = 28 # Jane ... is 28 years old
    years_in_future = 6 # in six years
    jane_age_in_six_years = jane_current_age + years_in_future

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # half the age
    dara_age_in_six_years = jane_age_in_six_years / half_divisor

    # L3
    dara_current_age = dara_age_in_six_years - years_in_future

    # L4
    minimum_age = 25 # minimum age required to be employed at a company is 25 years
    years_to_wait = minimum_age - dara_current_age

    # FA
    answer = years_to_wait
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Jane will be {jane_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{jane_current_age}+{years_in_future}={jane_age_in_six_years}>>{jane_age_in_six_years} years old.

Dara will be half the age of Jane in {years_in_future} years, meaning she will be {jane_age_in_six_years}/{half_divisor} = <<{jane_age_in_six_years}/{half_divisor}={dara_age_in_six_years}>>{dara_age_in_six_years} years old in {years_in_future} years.
Dara has to wait for {minimum_age}-{dara_current_age} = <<{minimum_age}-{dara_current_age}={years_to_wait}>>{years_to_wait} more years to reach the company's minimum age of employment.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In 6 years, Jane will be 28+6 = <<28+6=34>>34 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Dara will be half the age of Jane in 6 years, meaning she will be 34/2 = <<34/2=17>>17 years old in 6 years.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Dara has to wait for 28-11 = <<28-11=17>>17 more years to reach the company's minimum age of employment.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'jane_current_age' (28) was used instead of 'minimum_age' (25).
